page.title: 15CUSTOMS LYTHE SUPPER
page.content:
{ {CUSTOMS- LYTHE TENANTS' SUPPER}
This event takes place every summer, either in July or August.It is probably a relic of an era when all the tenants came to pay the Lord their annual rent. Nowadays the Marquis of Normanby,the owner of the Estate, has a large marquee erected in the grounds of Mulgrave Castle for the event.Tables and chairs are provided and catering arrangements are made with an outside firm of caterers.All the Estate Workers and Tenants are invited to a supper,after which Lord Normanby speaks about the progress of the Estate and about proposed changes and developments.
